channel.title: An idea can some 1 help with it
channel.description: hi i was thinking of a grand exchange type thing but not quite, i was thinking ::sell (item name) and then it gives the money amount for that item and takes the item, and ::buy (item name) and it gives you the item and takes the money amount for that item,if you can make those commands for me i know where to put them thanks.

no 1 has an idea still? coz if not i will go ahead and add each command for each item (well the main items) not all 13000 lolz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 05:30:52 pm[/size][hr]ideas…?

item.title: An idea can some 1 help with it
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“jrs0804, post:3, topic:307430”]ya like that but with all items[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2009, 11:36:07 pm[/size][hr]
if(command.startsWith(“sell + itemId +”);
deleteItem(+ itemId +, 1)
addItem(995, amountofcash);
}

would that work…? :|[/quote]

Maybe i’m not quite sure

Read full topic
